rules.title: disable dead key backtick on Swedish layout
Mac caps lock to cmd / ctrl, escape when used alone

rules.description: Open URL in Firefox new tab

rules.title: vscode toggle windows (OBS! also requires you to set workbench.action.show(Next+Previous)WindowTab) in vscode

to.shell_command: sleep 0.1 && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke return'

bundle_identifiers: disabled. to be able to use leader-a in terminal

rules.title: firefox tabs list (use vimium keybinding instead: `map <m-e> Vomnibar.activateTabSelection`)
Key right of  (macbook) and above enter on external keyboard TO slash and backslash
Kitty sets left option to alt so make tilde work like usual
Aerospace window focus with cmd + hjkl
slower repeat for spacebar and backspace
